      • bisectionMethod

        public double bisectionMethod​(double a,
                              double b,
                              double epsilon)
        calculates the square root of the function in the domain [a,b] with an error smaller than epsilon using the Bisection Method
        Parameters:
        a - the start of the domain
        b - the end of the domain
        epsilon - the maximum error
        Returns:
        the square root of the function in the domain [a,b] with an error smaller than epsilon

                                  double epsilon)
        calculates the square root of the function an epsilon distance away from point a using the Newton Raphson Method
        Parameters:
        a - the point in question
        epsilon - the distance from the point
        Returns:
        the square root of the function an epsilon distance away from point a
